articles.author: Satoshi Sugiyama, Leika Kihara
articles.title: Japan warns of action over rapid currency moves - Reuters.com
articles.description: Japan may have to take action against any disorderly, speculative-driven foreign exchange moves, the government's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda said on Tuesday, reinforcing Tokyo's readiness to intervene again to support a fragile yen.

articles.author: Arslan Ali
articles.title: Natural Gas and Oil Forecast: Prices Recover; Will the Uptrend Continue Today? - FX Empire
articles.description: As oil and natural gas prices show signs of rebounding, investors eagerly await to see if the upward trend will persist through today.
articles.content: Todays technical outlook for UKOIL reveals a stable price at $83.41, with no significant change in the recent session. Oil is currently trading just above the pivotal mark at $83.32, which could act … [+658 chars]

articles.author: Rita Nazareth
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for May 7 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Stocks remained close to their highest levels in about a month, with investors at crossroads about how much further the market can sustain the rebound from April’s selloff.
articles.content:
